mapper.sql: id as id , relate_major as relateMajor , introduction as introduction , work_content as workContent , vocational_demand as vocationalDemand , career_prospects as careerProspects , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_profession_detail ( relate_major, introduction, work_content, vocational_demand, career_prospects, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{relateMajor}, #{introduction}, #{workContent}, #{vocationalDemand}, #{careerProspects}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_profession_detail
relate_major = #{relateMajor},
introduction = #{introduction},
work_content = #{workContent},
vocational_demand = #{vocationalDemand},
career_prospects = #{careerProspects},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_profession_detail
relate_major = #{map.relateMajor},
introduction = #{map.introduction},
work_content = #{map.workContent},
vocational_demand = #{map.vocationalDemand},
career_prospects = #{map.careerProspects},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
is_delete = #{map.isDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_profession_detail ( relate_major, introduction, work_content, vocational_demand, career_prospects, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{map.relateMajor}, #{map.introduction}, #{map.workContent}, #{map.vocationalDemand}, #{map.careerProspects}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, relate_major
, introduction
, work_content
, vocational_demand
, career_prospects
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, is_delete
FROM zgk_profession_detail
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND relate_major like CONCAT('%', #{condition.relateMajor} , '%')
AND introduction like CONCAT('%', #{condition.introduction} , '%')
AND work_content like CONCAT('%', #{condition.workContent} , '%')
AND vocational_demand like CONCAT('%', #{condition.vocationalDemand} , '%')
AND career_prospects like CONCAT('%', #{condition.careerProspects} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND is_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
